prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a rebellious East-Asian woman, messy spiky black hair, confident smirk, wearing a **tight ribbed purple tube top, and loose-fit magenta canvas cargo pants**
feature_prompt: hyper-realistic skin texture, individual hair strands, detailed fabric weave on tube top, robust canvas texture on cargo pants
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, doll, neon purple, flat lighting, low quality, blurry face, delicate features, over-polished, no uniform, plain clothes
